title: tiruvaDi tozhudu
sahitya:
tiruvaDi tozhudu un tiruvaruL peruvEn marudamalai muruganE perumidam ura nAn


anupallavi

  karuvaDaiyum kuzhiyil kaNakkE illAmal marupaDiyum vizhundu piravi eDukkAmal


caraNam    ara neri ninriDum Atral kunrAmal pirar nalam pENum priyam kuraiyAmal
kurai EdumillAda nirai vAzhvinai nAn urudiyAip-peravum ulaginil uyyavum
